title: The symmetric principle
text: If a region R is symmetric about a line l, then the centroid of R lies on l.
speech: If a region R is symmetric about a line l, then the centroid of R lies on l.
pacedSpeech: If a region R is symmetric about a line l, then the centroid of R lies on l.

title: The symmetric principle
text: We can use the symmetry principle to help find the centroid of a symmetric region.
